structure.unit: TITLE TO PROPERTY AND RESTRICTIONS ON USE, OWNERSHIP, AND ALIENATION

law.text: An interest created in real or personal property shall not be void by reason of any rule against perpetuities, whether the common law rule or otherwise. The common law rule against perpetuities shall not be in force in this Commonwealth.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 21, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2010.
